about.title: About Us
about.missionText: SyriaHC is rooted in compassion and solidarity. In the aftermath of years of conflict, we are dedicated to supporting the recovery of Syria's healthcare system by gathering vital medical donations. We work to connect generous donors with healthcare professionals on the ground, delivering essential medical equipment and supplies to hospitals and clinics in need. Every contribution helps rebuild hope, restore dignity, and save lives where it matters most.
about.whoWeAreText: Our team is a dedicated coalition of Syrian and international volunteers, healthcare professionals, technology experts, and advocates. United by a shared commitment to transparency and impact, we work tirelessly to ensure that every donation delivers the greatest possible benefit to those in need.
about.howItWorksText: We coordinate with hospitals and health centers to identify precise medical needs. We collect medical donations from abroad based on these needs. We work with trusted organizations and partners to coordinate the shipping and delivery of donations to Syria.
about.contactText: Feel free to contact us with questions or suggestions:

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text1: SyriaHC is a humanitarian initiative rooted in compassion and solidarity. In the aftermath of years of destruction and bombing, rebuilding the healthcare system has become an urgent priority on the path to national recovery. That’s why we are committed to supporting the restoration of Syria’s healthcare infrastructure by collecting essential medical donations and delivering critical supplies to the hospitals and clinics most in need.
mission.text2: We connect generous donors from around the world with frontline healthcare workers in Syria to ensure that aid reaches where it is needed most. Our operations are guided by direct coordination with medical facilities to identify specific needs, gather suitable donations abroad, and partner with trusted organizations to ensure safe delivery to Syria.
mission.text3: Our team is made up of dedicated Syrian and international volunteers — including doctors, healthcare professionals, technology experts, and humanitarian advocates — all united by a deep commitment to transparency and impact. We work tirelessly to ensure every donation brings maximum benefit to those who need it most. At SyriaHC, we believe that rebuilding health is the foundation for rebuilding life.
mission.donationImpact: of contributions go to medical facilities

joinMission.title: Join Our Mission Today
joinMission.text: With 15.8 million people needing humanitarian health assistance, every contribution, no matter how small, helps equip hospitals and clinics with the tools they need to save lives in Syria.

case1.title: MRI Machine for Deir al-Zor Hospital
case1.description: The main hospital in Deir al-Zor urgently needs an MRI machine to diagnose hundreds of patients monthly. Your support will help purchase and install this critical equipment.

case2.title: Ventilators for Idlib Medical Center
case2.description: This facility requires additional ventilators to treat respiratory conditions. Contributions will fund 5 units for their ICU.

case3.title: Ultrasound Equipment for Rural Clinics
case3.description: Mobile clinics in rural Damascus need portable ultrasound devices. Your contribution will provide 3 units serving over 200 patients weekly.
